sentences.sContent: It is a glorious thing to die for the people.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is a glorious thing to die for the people.
sentences.sCn: 为人民而死， 虽死犹荣!

sentences.sContent: It is a brave person who will die for his beliefs.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is a brave person who will die for his beliefs.
sentences.sCn: 为他的信仰而死的人是勇敢的人。

sentences.sContent: Why do we crave love so much, even to the point that we would die for it?
sentences.sContent_eng: Why do we crave love so much, even to the point that we would die for it?
sentences.sCn: 为什么我们渴望的爱这么多，甚至到了会为爱而死的地步？
